repair_recommendation.description: The front tire (left) is completely flat and requires replacement. The front door (left) has minor damage that may require repair or repainting, depending on the extent of the damage.

safety_concerns.concern: Flat tire may lead to loss of control while driving.

severity_explanation: The damage includes two flat tires, which significantly affects the vehicle's functionality and safety. The front tire (left) is completely flat, while the front door (left) has minor damage. The overall impact on safety and functionality classifies this as moderate severity.
cost_breakdown: The estimated repair costs include $800 for the replacement of the front tire and $400-$1200 for the repair or repainting of the front door, plus labor costs estimated at $200-$800 depending on the complexity of the door repair.
